# this is homework 2 in class fixing stuff

## along with creating objects in class making it look good. 

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

a <- 1
b <- 2
a <= b

ls()

rm(list = ls())
```

# rm function explained

we have to use the list=ls() because the rm function will default to the "..." list when it goes to find the file you want to remove.
